name: web
description: A mobile-friendly Sudoku built with plain HTML/CSS/JS. Stable grid , Notes mode, undo/redo, smart hints, same-number highlight, numpad counting, and a timer.

scripts.dev: run-s clean prepare:dist dev:static && run-p dev:js dev:css
scripts.dev:static: shx cp -f index.html manifest.json icon192.png dist/
scripts.build: run-s clean prepare:dist build:* build:html verify:no-maps publish:docs
scripts.verify:no-maps: node -e "const fs=require('fs');if(fs.existsSync('dist')){for(const f of fs.readdirSync('dist')){if(f.endsWith('.map')){console.error('❌ Found sourcemap:', f);process.exit(1);}}}console.log('✅ OK: no sourcemaps in dist');"
scripts.deploy:pages: shx rm -rf docs && shx cp -r dist docs
scripts.publish:docs: shx rm -rf docs && shx mkdir -p docs && shx cp -r dist/* docs/ && shx touch docs/.nojekyll
